name: Save The Earth (HardGamer)
description:
Save the Earth is a perception game, where you control an awesome force field that was launched into space. Your mission is to combine the colors to destroys the enemy alien ships.

Android 4.1 'Jelly Bean' or highest.

Game Version: 1.003

Features:

  • Control an awesome force field around the Earth;
  • Active a bomb to eliminate enemies (every 10 points);
  • Over time, the enemies will attack with more speed and in greater number.

[IMPORTANT] This is my first published game, it's simple but it's from the heart. I still have a lot to learn and I hope you enjoy the game. I'm have trouble figuring out how all this works (updating the game version, using google services), but I'm trying as hard as I can.
